mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_employee(employee_id, PASSWD, emp_name, PROFIL, birth, gender, emp_tel, emp_mail, emp_addr, JOB_ID, DEPTID) VALUES(#{employee_id}, #{PASSWD}, #{emp_name}, #{PROFIL}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{emp_tel}, #{emp_mail}, #{emp_addr}, #{JOB_ID}, #{DEPTID})
mapper.select: SELECT emp.employee_id, emp.emp_name, job.JOB, dept.DEPTNM, emp.start_date, emp.STATUS FROM tbl_employee emp LEFT JOIN tbl_job job ON emp.JOB_ID = job.JOB_ID LEFT JOIN tbl_department dept ON emp.DEPTID = dept.DEPTID
